name: SKYRAZE
description:
A game made by Ben Kilby in the space of 4 days

The target was missed so the game took longer than 4 days however it was made far under 96 hours so just days averaging at around 6-8hrs with the whole development recorded.

Since the game was made in such a short time I didn't add everything I wanted to meaning some story menus don't work, 2 player doesn't work, enemy air crafts clip into each other when dodging, pause menu/ game over screen do not cover full screen and air craft switch option in level menu doesn't work. If people end up playing the game I will happily come back and patch a few things and even adding a few more things like maps, enemies and a story mode.

Controls:

A or left arrow key = left

D or right arrow key = right

S or down arrow key = invincible powerup (must be bought)

NOTE. you can only be either 1 invincible or ressurection powerup per each game.
